ai-patthana21.21:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.21:1.1_0: Not placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-patthana21.21:2.1_0: Not placing the mind or keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-patthana21.21:3.1_0: Not placing the mind or keeping it connected. Thoughts don’t give rise to the thought.
